messages.subject: modern blades
messages.msgSnippet: hi All...  I am looking for any info on where to acquire a modern day traditionally forged Japanese swords .  I see many websites that list them but they seem
messages.messageBody:
hi All... I am looking for any info on where to acquire a modern day
traditionally forged Japanese swords . I see many websites that list
them but they seem to vary widely as to quality and price lol .Being
insatiably curious I am just curious as to where one might obtain a
modern day live blade . Any suggestions would be appreciated !
Thanks in advance
Thomas Smead
